h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 4
content: The next Blood of the Iron Bull material can be found after the Black Wind Cave \- Outside The Cave Shrine in Black Wind Mountain. It is located on the bamboo bridge, just after the Shrine itself. You will find it in a chest on the path, just heading off from the bridge, if you jump over the barriers of the bridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 4'.
The content is as follows:
The next Blood of the Iron Bull material can be found after the Black Wind Cave \- Outside The Cave Shrine in Black Wind Mountain. It is located on the bamboo bridge, just after the Shrine itself. You will find it in a chest on the path, just heading off from the bridge, if you jump over the barriers of the bridge.
